column2: "You must have lots of time to kill, judging from the way you're just loitering around here. "
"If you've got so much free time, maybe you should go help out those other newbies out there."
"Hack graduates should support other hacks by all means. That's just a given!"
"There are plenty of rescue missions down in the Tunnels, so get off your rear end and go do some rescuing already!"
